title: Entertainment Live: More from Strictly, and Bake off figures - BBC News
summary: georgia may foote joins strictly line-up .
more bill cosby accusers speak out .

documents.title: the end
text: and on that note , we 'll call it a day .
thanks for stopping by , and please come back from 08:30 bst tomorrow , when we will once again keep you updated with all the arts and entertainment news you need to know .
author: Ian Youngs
Entertainment reporter

documents.title: courtroom artist goes viral
text: a us courtroom artist has gone viral after her sketch of new england patriots quarterback tom brady was ridiculed on social media .
some twitter users spoofed the sketch by pasting it onto everything from edvard munch 's the scream to an image from the film et .
the athlete has been suspended by the nfl over claims he used deflated footballs during a playoff game , which can be easier to catch .
read more .
below is what he normally looks like , and some of the memes .

documents.title: back to downton
text: the first photos from the sixth and final series of downton abbey have been released today .
itv also revealed that patricia hodge would join the cast - but only in time for the final episode on christmas day .
here 's a selection of the photos :
creator julian fellowes told journalists :
i 'm very unlikely to be involved in anything that is as successful again and so , of course , i say goodbye to these golden years with a slight pang .
but it seems the right time to go while we 're still firing . ''

documents.title: lend me your ears
text: next week at shakespeare 's globe theatre in london , the scottish play will become the cantonese play when hong kong 's tang shu-wing theatre studio performs macbeth .
in the past , shakespeare 's plays have been translated into maori , sign language and even klingon .
but can the bard 's bawdy jokes and tragic plotlines really transcend language ?
culture 's brendan cole has been looking at what gets lost - and gained - in translation .

documents.title: cilla 's inquest postponed
text: the inquest into cilla black 's death was postponed at the eleventh hour today after it emerged that her body was not in liverpool .

liverpool coroner 's court was due to host the hearing this afternoon , but proceedings were cancelled an hour beforehand when officials realised cilla 's remains were not in the required legal jurisdiction .
the inquest is now expected to open tomorrow .
the 72-year-old singer and tv star died earlier this month at her spanish home .
authorities there said she died from a stroke after falling over and hitting her head .

documents.title: sheeran tattoo 'work in progress '
text: ed sheeran 's tattoo artist has told the bbc that the lion on the singer 's chest is only half-finished .

kevin paul , who 's based in derbyshire , told bbc radio derby 's ian skye the photo ed put on instagram on tuesday was taken only a few hours in to the work , and that the tattoo now looks very different .
`` that was about three hours into it .
it does n't look anything like that now , '' he said .
`` it 's going to connect to arms , it 's going to go across the shoulders .
we 've probably got another six or seven hours [ to do ] . ''
the lion was intended to symbolise sheeran 's solo gigs at wembley stadium and kevin said both he and the singer were surprised at the strong reaction to the tattoo .
ed sheeran
edsheeran
all this kerfuffle over a tattoo .
if it was black and white saying a clever phrase in a language i ca n't speak no one would 've said anything

edsheeran
it 's not the first weird tattoo i 've got and it wo n't be the last , but i like all of them .

the film is a remake of the classic tv sitcom - however it 's fair to say you were n't entirely convinced .

documents.title: killers star scraps gigs
text: the killers frontman brandon flowers has cancelled six dates on his solo us tour .
he has scrapped all gigs until next wednesday ,
no official statement has been given , although the venues have cited `` unforeseen circumstances . ''
flowers released his second solo album , the desired effect , earlier this year , reaching number 17 in the us chart .
author: Billboard

documents.title: waterman 's cole tribute
text: it 's been an emotional day for friends and family of actor george cole , whose funeral has been held in reading .
the actor , best known for playing wheeler-dealer arthur daley in itv 's minder , died last week aged 90 .
delivering the eulogy , dennis waterman , who starred opposite cole ( above ) , said : `` people are always asking me for anecdotes .
working with george was an anecdote .
it was non-stop .
we laughed all day long , every day .
`` it 's a wonderful day , i suppose , but a horrible one .
personally , i would rather be doing hamlet with no rehearsals than this . ''
speaking afterwards , waterman added : `` he was just the most popular person in showbiz and the nicest and the best .
`` he was happiest when he was at home , when he was getting a few winners , and with his family and in his garden . ''

documents.title: new lion king
text: those creative types over at disney have made a new lion king movie .
the lion guard : return of the roar will star the voices of parks and recreation 's rob lowe as simba and bring it on 's gabrielle union as nala .
more exciting , however , is the return of james earl jones as the voice of mufasa .
the hour-long film will be shown on the disney channel in november .

documents.title: huge cast for iliad
text: a company of more than 60 actors will bring the greek epic the iliad to life at a marathon reading at the almeida theatre in north london on friday .
it is part of the theatre 's greek festival , which saw welsh singer charlotte church make her theatre debut last week .
there are far too many names to list them all - but they do include bond stars ben whishaw and rory kinnear , sinead cusack , simon callow , bertie carvel and mark gatiss .
the event will be live streamed at

documents.title: jacko makes quechua cool
text: quechua .
unless you 're a student of anthropology or languages , the word will probably be lost on you .

it 's an ancient tongue spoken by the incas , and a teenage girl from peru has taken it to an audience of millions via youtube by using it to perform a cover of michael jackson 's the way you make me feel .

documents.title: downton abbey taster
text: itv has been hosting a screening of the first episode in the final series of downton abbey , and a press conference with cast members .
our reporter frances cronin has sent this
the first episode is a cracker - very funny bits between carson and mrs hughes over the nature of their marriage and something from mary 's past comes back to haunt her .
dame maggie smith , who plays the dowager countess of grantham , revealed the first thing she 's going to do now that filming is over is `` have a lie down '' and watch the show 's entire box set .
`` i was surprised that i got to the end , '' she said .
`` because just before this i 'd done about 10 years with harry potter , so i felt very very old indeed by the time i got to the dowager .
`` so i was surprised i got through , and i 'm still here . ''

documents.title: gladiators . ready ! !
text: now looking more like the cast of last of the summer wine ( not really ) , some of the original gladiators , shouty referee john anderson and host ulrika jonsson have been reunited for a new itv show .
the saturday night story will look back at some of the best-loved television moments .
jonsson actually dated hunter ( second right ) .
and yes gentlemen , that is an overexcited jet to the left of the presenter .
the show starts this weekend .

documents.title: new judith kerr novel announced
text: children 's author judith kerr is to have a new novel , inspired by a true story involving her father , published at the age of 92 .
mister cleghorn 's seal tells the tale of mr cleghorn who , on a visit to the seaside , rescues a seal pup named charlie .
an audio-book version will be voiced by bill nighy .
`` i 've always loved my father 's story , '' said kerr , who has written book for children for more than six decades , with titles including the tiger who came to tea and mog the forgetful cat .

documents.title: 8.9m watch bake-off
text: the second episode of great british bake-off was watched by an average audience of 8.9 million on bbc one last night , according to overnight ratings .
that 's 400,000 down on last week 's opening episode - but still pretty good .
it was biscuit week but which of the contestant saw their hopes crumble ?
you can watch the episode again or get the recipes

documents.title: nice oscar . how much for it ?
text: that 's £ 6.40 to those in the uk .
that is precisely how much the academy of motion picture arts and sciences will have to pay to recover a statuette awarded in 1942 , a los angeles judge has ruled .
the oscar in question was awarded to joseph c wright for his colour art direction on my gal sal .

his heirs sold the oscar in june 2014 to auctioneers nate d sander , but the academy claimed they breached a rule that oscar winners and their heirs can not sell statuettes without first offering it to the organisation for $ 10 .
now , a judge has apparently agreed with them .

documents.title: george cole 's funeral held
text: the funeral of minder star george cole is taking place in reading .
the actor died last week aged 90 .
mourners include his former co-star dennis waterman ( below left ) and actor patrick malahide .
the theme tune to the series that made actor cole a tv favourite has been played at his funeral .
i could be so good for you was a hit for waterman in 1980 .

documents.title: grandma : the musical
text: do you know what your grandparents really got up to when they were young ?
or do your grandchildren know about your youthful exploits ?
possibly not .
but a group of young people have been asking their grandparents to tell all about their teenage years - and are now creating and starring in a stage musical based on what they have found out .
the show 's name ?
dirty stop outs .

documents.title: abrams explains star wars names
text: jj abrams , the director behind what seems to be the most hotly-anticipated movie of , oh , we do n't know , the last 20 years , has been speaking to entertainment weekly about how he came up with the new star wars character names .
apparently oscar isaac 's x-wing fighter pilot poe dameron is named after a cuddly polar bear toy ( seriously ?
) , while game of thrones star gwendoline christie 's captain phasma was inspired by the 1979 horror film phantasm .
author: Entertainment Weekly

documents.title: glastonbury 's good causes
text: glastonbury is n't just for watching bands , drinking your weight in cider and finding yourself in the transcendental meditation tent , you know .
festival organiser emily eavis has announced that , as well as giving 177,000 people a jolly good time , last year 's event ( when metallica headlined ) raised £ 2m for charity .
that included £ 500,000 each for oxfam and greenpeace and £ 250,000 for wateraid .
hundreds of other local , national and international charities received smaller amounts .

documents.title: dad 's army film trailer
text: the first trailer for the new dad 's army movie is out .
it shows the new-look captain mainwaring ( played by toby jones ) , bill nighy as sergeant wilson and michael gambon as private godfrey .
what do you think ?
does it do justice to the original ?
and is remaking classic sitcoms ever a good idea ? .
get in touch at @ twitterid or entertainment.news @ bbc.co.uk .

documents.title: jack whitehall on cilla
text: one of cilla black 's last interviews before her death was with jack whitehall on his tv show backchat at the start of the year .
whitehall has now written about meeting her in the sun 's bizarre column , saying it was `` a real honour '' to interview her .
he wrote :
she was very frail .
she was quite hard of hearing , she could n't really see .
we were warned of all these things and that she was n't in the best of health .
but inside she was firing on all cylinders and she still had so much .
the pop star and tv favourite , who died earlier this month at the age of 72 , will be buried in her home city of liverpool next week , it has been announced .
author: The Sun

documents.title: stolen picasso returns to france
text: a painting by picasso , valued at around $ 15m ( £ 9.6m ) , is to be returned to france , from where it was stolen 17 years ago .
la coiffeuse , or the hairdresser , was recovered at a fedex building in newark , new jersey last christmas , wrapped in plain parcel paper .
it had been sent by someone in belgium who had declared that it contained an arts and crafts gift valued at $ 37 ( £ 24 ) .
meanwhile , another picasso work ( below ) , which was seized from a yacht on corsica in july , has been transferred a museum in madrid .
the painting , head of a young woman , had been subject to a spanish export ban and was bound for switzerland when it was intercepted by french officials .

documents.title: new doctor who trailer
text: last night bbc tv viewers got the first look at the latest trailer for the new series of doctor who .
it gives glimpses of game of thrones star maisie williams , who has joined the show , lots of fearsome monsters , a dalek city and peter capaldi 's time lord as a rock star .
if you missed it , here it is .
let us know what you think .

documents.title: oyelowo set to voice bond
text: british actor david oyelowo is to lend his silky tones to a new james bond audio book .

the actor , who recently played martin luther king in the movie selma , will voice bond in the audio version of trigger mortis , written by anthony horowitz and commissioned by the ian fleming estate .
however oyelowo is not , as is being reported , the first black actor to voice 007 - hugh quarshie read dr no as part of a box set in 2012 .

oyelowo said : `` i am officially the only person on planet earth who can legitimately say : 'i am the new james bond ' - even saying that name is the cinematic equivalent of doing the 'to be or not to be ' speech . ''
author: The Guardian

documents.title: more cosby accusers speak out
text: three more women have come forward to say they were sexually assaulted by us comedian bill cosby .
the women - two actresses and an ex-flight attendant - held a press conference in los angeles .
one of them said she was attacked when she met cosby in 1971 during a job interview .
`` his attack was fast with surgical precision and surprise on his side , '' said linda ridgeway whitedeer .
they join more than 40 other women who claim abuse by cosby , who played a beloved family doctor on the hit 1980s sitcom the cosby show .
cosby , 78 , has denied the allegations .

documents.title: ex-corrie star joins strictly
text: former coronation street actress georgia may foote is the latest celebrity to join this year 's strictly come dancing line-up .
foote started her career in grange hill before going on to play katy armstrong in the itv soap .
she left the show earlier this year , when
foote is the fourth person to be announced , joining jeremy vine , ainsley harriott and kellie bright on the line-up .
the series kicks off next month .

documents.title: get involved
text: so what are your thoughts on today 's stories ?
as ever , please get in touch by tweeting us at
author: Kev Geoghegan
Arts and entertainment reporter

documents.title: lights , camera , action
text: welcome to thursday 's rolling coverage of all the arts and entertainment news that 's fit to put on the internet .
first on the agenda - the latest strictly come dancing contestant is being revealed on bbc breakfast very soon .
we 'll let you know who it is as soon as her identity has been revealed .
author: Ian Youngs
Entertainment reporter
